name: Temple of Gold
description:
Temple of Gold - is a short and rather challenging platformer game, inspired by many platform-hell titles.  It is also  remaster of one of my older games, Temple of Heart.

I've added many new features along with fixing lots of known problems and bugs of an original game:

  • 2 NEW levels that differ from already existing, which got changed a lot too 
  • Reworked textures of original game, making it look more alive
  • Added new traps, to make every level as challenging as I could
  • Endings changed, endless music overlay fixed
  • And many secrets coming in next updates!

Who are we playing as this time? An old guy, poor and hungry. So he decides to get enough gold to be happy for all his life. And what's the better place to find gold than death-temple riddled with spikes and other malevolent architecture wonders!

Controls:
  • Arrow keys - moving, navigating menus
  • Esc - pause
  • Enter - confirm
